title: Assigning a non-existant map key to an empty interface is not nil
body:
by **jamesonl@spotter360.com**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

http://play.golang.org/p/_dR7wiWCF7

What is the expected output?

The interface{} typed variable should be nil.

What do you see instead?

The interface{} typed value is not nil.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g and 5g

Which operating system are you using?

Linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go1.1.1 linux/amd64

Also tested on go1.1
